question:
You work for an international company. You have seen an advertisement for a training course which will be useful for you job.


write a letter to your manager
text: I am writing to you today because I am interested in attending a session that will help me improve at some certain point. To illustrate, it is about improving communication skills, sales skills and presentation skills. Moreover, it will include some practical workshops which will boost my interpersonal abilities.

Moreover, there are some points that the corporation can help with. Firstly, it can free me from the extra tasks that I have been doing for the past couple of months such as doing extra hours and  helping the newly recruited workers.

Finally, I would like to point out  how much this learning experience will induce my productivity. I am convinced that it will help me to increase my sales numbers and my work quality. Additionally, it will give me the needed capabilities in order to get promoted later on throughout my career within the firm.
I am looking forward to your reply.
